sql-select.name: GetListOfDatabaseSchemas
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [NodeUName] ,tSU.[uid] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,CASE WHEN tSU.[name] IN (N'dbo') THEN N'DboSchemaIcon' ELSE N'SchemaIcon' END AS [NodeUIcon] ,N'#808080' AS [NodeFontColor] ,N'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [XTypeId] ,tSU.[uid] AS [SchemaId] ,tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] WHERE tSO.[xtype] = @XTypeId GROUP BY tSO.[xtype] ,tSU.[uid] ,tSU.[name] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [NodeUName] ,tSS.[schema_id] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,CASE WHEN tSS.[name] IN (N'dbo') THEN N'DboSchemaIcon' WHEN tSS.[name] IN (N'sys') THEN N'SysSchemaIcon' ELSE N'SchemaIcon' END AS [NodeUIcon] ,N'#808080' AS [NodeFontColor] ,N'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,tSO.[type] AS [XTypeId] ,tSS.[schema_id] AS [SchemaId] ,tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] WHERE tSO.[type] = @XTypeId GROUP BY tSO.[type] ,tSS.[schema_id] ,tSS.[name] ORDER BY tSS.[name] ;
